answerText: retrosynthesis [or retrosynthetic analysis][10] A common carbon-carbon bond forming reaction involves the use of these magnesium-halide-containing reagents named for a Frenchman. They attack carbonyls to form alcohols.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 8 | 10 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer some questions about planning an organic synthesis. [10] Name this synthetic thought process pioneered by EJ Corey, in which a synthesis of a complex molecule is run backwards without regard for the starting products.
